name: Brave Bubble Heart
description:
Brave Bubble Heart is an arcade with a subtle roguelike inspiration, where you control a brave soul in the form of a bubble. Your ammo is also your life. Explore the randomly generated water abyss. Solve puzzles for useful rewards and defeat the creatures that will do anything to keep you trapped until death.
